name: Low Stance Combat
description: Master Silat’s unique low stances that improve balance, mobility, and evasiveness.

cards.title: Squat Evade and Counter
cards.description: A defensive movement that allows quick evasions followed by counterattacks.
bulletpoints: Drop into a deep squat to avoid high attacks
Keep weight evenly distributed for fast transitions
Use hand strikes while rising for added power
cards.summaryText: Sink into the squat to slip high shots, then spring up with strikes on the rebound.

cards.title: Low Leg Sweep
cards.description: A sweeping attack targeting an opponent’s base to take them off balance.
bulletpoints: Stay low and use a circular sweeping motion
Engage hips to generate more power
Follow up immediately to prevent recovery
cards.summaryText: Glide a low sweep with hip drive to rip their base and surge into the next attack.
